homePage.servicesText1: Cordada is a marketing and communication agency specialized in the outdoor sports and cycling sector. We offer an integral service that goes from planning to execution and distribution, and we meet the needs of companies, athletes, institutions and organizations that are looking for value and quality solutions.
homePage.expertsDescription:
SPORTS MARKETING, SOCIAL MEDIA 
 CONTENT CREATION AND BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT

corpCopy.title: In the mountain you don't get roped to anyone.
corpCopy.mainText: Beyond friendship, beyond affection, the person with whom you get roped to is the depositary of the most absolute of trusts: your life in their hands, and vice versa. In a literal sense, without melodramas. And in this symbiotic relationship of trust, based on security and the synergy of forces, lies the key to progression and success on the mountain: we can do it because we go together, because we are roped to one another. Whoever finds a good rope partner finds a good life partner.
corpCopy.higlightedText: Our rope team is composed of a community of mountain, sport and outdoor lovers, united by a common project: sharing our passion, our energy, our values and our experience with whoever wants to join our rope.
